Info.About:
This model is based on the greenhouse climate model described in Chapter 8 of Vanthoor (2011). Further description of the model is in Chapter 2 of Vanthoor (2011), also published as Vanthoor et al. (2011a).

Equations for radiative transmission and reflection of multiple layers have been adjusted according to Katzin et al. (2020), to allow for easier model extension. See functions tau12, rho12Up, rho12Dn, under "Lumped cover layers", below.
Initial values for the model states were chosen to represent 16.5°C, roughly 70% RH, and 390 ppm.
Info.Usage:
This file follows Vanthoor 2011, Chapter 8 and therefore only models a greenhouse, and contains no definitions for the crop or greenhouse climate control. All values related to the crop and climate control has been set to zero, therefore simulations using this file alone represent a greenhouse with no crop, closed windows, and no active climate control.

In this file, input variables have been given as constants. In order to run meaningful simulations, a file with time-series input data is needed.
For an example on how to run this file with a crop model and weather inputs, see main_vanthoor_2011.json

References.Vanthoor 2011: Vanthoor, Bram (2011). A model-based greenhouse design method. PhD thesis, Wageningen University. https://edepot.wur.nl/170301
References.Vanthoor 2011a: Vanthoor, B. H. E., Stanghellini, C., van Henten, E. J., & de Visser, P. H. B. (2011). A methodology for model-based greenhouse design: Part 1, a greenhouse climate model for a broad range of designs and climates. Biosystems Engineering, 110(4), 363–377. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.biosystemseng.2011.06.001
References.Katzin 2020: Katzin, D., van Mourik, S., Kempkes, F., & van Henten, E. J. (2020). GreenLight – An open source model for greenhouses with supplemental lighting: Evaluation of heat requirements under LED and HPS lamps. Biosystems Engineering, 194, 61–81. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.biosystemseng.2020.03.010
References.Katzin 2021: Katzin, David (2021). Energy Saving by LED Lighting in Greenhouses : A Process-Based Modelling Approach. PhD thesis, Wageningen University. https://doi.org/10.18174/544434
References.De Zwart 1996: De Zwart, H. F. (1996) Analyzing energy-saving options in greenhouse cultivation using a simulation model. PhD thesis, Landbouwuniversiteit Wageningen. https://edepot.wur.nl/195238
References.Stanghellini 2019: Stanghellini, S., Van 't Ooster, B., Heuvelink E. (2019). Greenhouse horticulture: Technology for optimal crop production. Brill, Wageningen Academic. http://doi.org/10.1163/9789004697041

Info.Notation: Several notations used in Vanthoor (2011) have been modified here: aGhPar used in Vanthoor is denoted aCovPar here; DeltaH used in Vanthoor is L here; vWind used in Vanthoor is wind here.
Info.Authors: This file was written by David Katzin (Wageningen University & Research), Pierre-Olivier Schwarz (Université Laval), and Joshi Graf (Wageningen University & Research)
Info.Date: This file was created in May 2025

Time.description: Time unit used in the model state equations (ordinary differential equations, ODEs)

tCan.definition: (1/capCan) * (rParSunCan + rNirSunCan + rPipeCan - hCanAir - lCanAir - rCanCovIn - rCanFlr - rCanSky - rCanThScr)

tAir.definition: (1/capAir) * (hCanAir + hPadAir + hMechAir + hPipeAir + hPasAir + hBlowAir + rGlobSunAir - hAirFlr - hAirThScr - hAirOut - hAirTop - hAirOutPad - lAirFog)
tAir.description: Temperature of the air in the main compartment of the greenhouse (below the screen)

tFlr.definition: (1/capFlr) * (hAirFlr + rParSunFlr + rNirSunFlr + rCanFlr + rPipeFlr - hFlrSo1 - rFlrCovIn - rFlrSky - rFlrThScr)

tThScr.definition: (1/capThScr) * (hAirThScr + lAirThScr + rCanThScr + rFlrThScr + rPipeThScr - hThScrTop - rThScrCovIn - rThScrSky)

tTop.description: Temperature of the air in the top compartment of the greenhouse (above the screen)

tCovIn.definition: (1/capCovIn) * (hTopCovIn + lTopCovIn + rCanCovIn + rFlrCovIn + rPipeCovIn + rThScrCovIn - hCovInCovE)
tCovIn.description: Temperature of the internal side of the greenhouse cover

tCovE.description: Temperature of the internal side of the greenhouse cover

tPipe.definition: 1 / capPipe * (hBoilPipe + hIndPipe + hGeoPipe - rPipeSky - rPipeCovIn - rPipeCan - rPipeFlr - rPipeThScr - hPipeAir)

vpAir.definition: (1/capVpAir) * (mvCanAir + mvPadAir + mvFogAir + mvBlowAir - mvAirThScr - mvAirTop - mvAirOut - mvAirOutPad - mvAirMech)
vpAir.description: Vapour pressure of the air in the main compartment of the greenhouse (below the screen)

vpTop.description: Vapour pressure of the air in the top compartment of the greenhouse (above the screen)

co2Air.description: CO2 concentration of the air in the main compartment of the greenhouse (below the screen)

co2Top.description: CO2 concentration of the air in the top compartment of the greenhouse (above the screen)

Lumped cover layers.about: Description of the "lumped" cover layers, i.e., the combined properties of the movable outdoor shading scr (ShScr), the semi-permanent shading screen (ShScrPer), the greenhouse roof (Rf), and the movable indoor thermal screen (ThScr)

tau12(tau1, tau2, rho1Up, rho1Dn, rho2Up.description: Transmission coefficient of a double layer, modified according to Katzin 2020, Equation A4. The unused arguments (rho1Up, rho2Dn) are included so that calls to tau12, rhoUp, rhoDn all have the same arguments. 1 is the top layer and 2 the bottom

rhoUp(tau1, tau2, rho1Up, rho1Dn, rho2Up.description: Upwards reflection coefficient of a double layer, modified according to Katzin 2020, Equation A5. The unused arguments (tau2, rho2Dn) are included so that calls to tau12, rhoUp, rhoDn all have the same arguments. 1 is the top layer and 2 the bottom

rhoDn(tau1, tau2, rho1Up, rho1Dn, rho2Up.description: Downward reflection coefficient of a double layer, modified according to Katzin 2020, Equation A6. The unused arguments (tau1, rho1Up) are included so that calls to tau12, rhoUp, rhoDn all have the same arguments. 1 is the top layer and 2 the bottom

tauShScrLayerPar.description: PAR transmission coefficient of the shading screen "layer": the vertical area of the shading screen (whether the screen is deployed or not)

tauShScrPerLayerPar.description: PAR transmission coefficient of the semi-permanent shading screen "layer": the vertical area of the semi-permanent shading screen (whether it is deployed or not)

rhoShScrLayerPar.description: PAR reflection coefficient of the shading screen "layer": the vertical area of the shading screen (whether the screen is deployed or not)

rhoShScrPerLayerPar.description: PAR reflection coefficient of the semi-permanent shading screen "layer": the vertical area of the screen (whether it is deployed or not)

tauShScrShScrPerPar.definition: tau12(tauShScrLayerPar, tauShScrPerLayerPar, rhoShScrLayerPar, rhoShScrLayerPar, rhoShScrPerLayerPar, rhoShScrPerLayerPar)
tauShScrShScrPerPar.description: PAR transmission coefficient of the shading screen and semi-permanent shading screen combined layer

rhoShScrShScrPerParUp.definition: rhoUp(tauShScrLayerPar, tauShScrPerLayerPar, rhoShScrLayerPar, rhoShScrLayerPar, rhoShScrPerLayerPar, rhoShScrPerLayerPar)
rhoShScrShScrPerParUp.description: PAR reflection coefficient of the shading screen and semi-permanent shading screen combined layer towards the top

rhoShScrShScrPerParDn.definition: rhoDn(tauShScrLayerPar, tauShScrPerLayerPar, rhoShScrLayerPar, rhoShScrLayerPar, rhoShScrPerLayerPar, rhoShScrPerLayerPar)
rhoShScrShScrPerParDn.description: PAR reflection coefficient of the shading screen and semi-permanent shading screen combined layer towards the bottom

tauThScrLayerPar.description: PAR transmission coefficient of the thermal screen "layer": the vertical area of the thermal screen (whether the screen is deployed or not)
tauThScrLayerPar.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 208 (as above); pg. 208-209: "the last 2 cover layers [...] are calculated analogously to Eqs. (8.16) and (8.17)"

rhoThScrLayerPar.description: PAR reflection coefficient of the thermal screen "layer": the vertical area of the thermal screen (whether the screen is deployed or not)
rhoThScrLayerPar.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 208 (as above); pg. 208-209: "the last 2 cover layers [...] are calculated analogously to Eqs. (8.16) and (8.17)"

tauRfThScrPar.definition: tau12(tauRfPar, tauThScrLayerPar, rhoRfPar, rhoRfPar, rhoThScrLayerPar, rhoThScrLayerPar)
tauRfThScrPar.description: PAR transmission coefficient of the thermal screen and roof combined layer
tauRfThScrPar.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.14, 8.16; pg. 208-209: "the last 2 cover layers [...] are calculated analogously to Eqs. (8.16) and (8.17)"

rhoRfThScrParUp.definition: rhoUp(tauRfPar, tauThScrLayerPar, rhoRfPar, rhoRfPar, rhoThScrLayerPar, rhoThScrLayerPar)
rhoRfThScrParUp.description: PAR reflection coefficient of the thermal screen and roof combined layer towards the top
rhoRfThScrParUp.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.15, 8.17; Katzin 2020, Equation A5; Vanthoor 2011, pg. 208-209: "the last 2 cover layers [...] are calculated analogously to Eqs. (8.16) and (8.17)"

rhoRfThScrParDn.definition: rhoDn(tauRfPar, tauThScrLayerPar, rhoRfPar, rhoRfPar, rhoThScrLayerPar, rhoThScrLayerPar)
rhoRfThScrParDn.description: PAR reflection coefficient of the thermal screen and roof combined layer towards the bottom
rhoRfThScrParDn.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.15, 8.17; Katzin 2020, Equation A6; Vanthoor 2011, pg. 208-209: "the last 2 cover layers [...] are calculated analogously to Eqs. (8.16) and (8.17)"

tauCovParVanthoor.definition: tau12(tauShScrShScrPerPar, tauRfThScrPar, rhoShScrShScrPerParUp, rhoShScrShScrPerParDn, rhoRfThScrParUp, rhoRfThScrParDn)
tauCovParVanthoor.description: PAR transmission coefficient of the cover
tauCovParVanthoor.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 209: "the transmission coefficient [...] determined using Eqs. (8.14) [...] of the two combined layers". Extra variable added for easier model extension

rhoCovParVanthoorUp.definition: rhoUp(tauShScrShScrPerPar, tauRfThScrPar, rhoShScrShScrPerParUp, rhoShScrShScrPerParDn, rhoRfThScrParUp, rhoRfThScrParDn)
rhoCovParVanthoorUp.description: PAR reflection coefficient of the cover towards the top
rhoCovParVanthoorUp.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 209: "the reflection coefficient [...] determined using Eqs. [...] (8.15) [...] of the two combined layers". Extra variable added for easier model extension

rhoCovParVanthoorDn.definition: rhoDn(tauShScrShScrPerPar, tauRfThScrPar, rhoShScrShScrPerParUp, rhoShScrShScrPerParDn, rhoRfThScrParUp, rhoRfThScrParDn)
rhoCovParVanthoorDn.description: PAR reflection coefficient of the cover towards the top
rhoCovParVanthoorDn.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 209: "the reflection coefficient [...] determined using Eqs. [...] (8.15) [...] of the two combined layers". Extra variable added for easier model extension

rhoCovPar.description: PAR reflection coefficient of the cover towards the top
rhoCovPar.reference: Extra variable added for easier model extension

tauCovPar.description: PAR reflection coefficient of the cover towards the top
tauCovPar.reference: Extra variable added for easier model extension

aCovPar.description: PAR absorption coefficient of the cover
aCovPar.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 209: "the absorption coefficient is one minus the sum of the transmission and reflection coefficient". Note that Vanthoor 2011 uses the notation aGhPar while here we use aCovPar

NIR.about: This section is analogous to the section "PAR", above, following Vanthoor 2011, pg. 208: "The optical properties for NIR are calculated in a similar way".

tauShScrLayerNir.description: NIR transmission coefficient of the shading screen "layer": the vertical area of the shading screen (whether the screen is deployed or not)

tauShScrPerLayerNir.description: NIR transmission coefficient of the semi-permanent shading screen "layer": the vertical area of the semi-permanent shading screen (whether it is deployed or not)

rhoShScrLayerNir.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the shading screen "layer": the vertical area of the shading screen (whether the screen is deployed or not)

rhoShScrPerLayerNir.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the semi-permanent shading screen "layer": the vertical area of the semi-permanent shading screen (whether it is deployed or not)

tauShScrShScrPerNir.definition: tau12(tauShScrLayerNir, tauShScrPerLayerNir, rhoShScrLayerNir, rhoShScrLayerNir, rhoShScrPerLayerNir, rhoShScrPerLayerNir)
tauShScrShScrPerNir.description: NIR transmission coefficient of the shading screen and semi-permanent shading screen combined layer

rhoShScrShScrPerNirUp.definition: rhoUp(tauShScrLayerNir, tauShScrPerLayerNir, rhoShScrLayerNir, rhoShScrLayerNir, rhoShScrPerLayerNir, rhoShScrPerLayerNir)
rhoShScrShScrPerNirUp.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the shading screen and semi-permanent shading screen combined layer towards the top

rhoShScrShScrPerNirDn.definition: rhoDn(tauShScrLayerNir, tauShScrPerLayerNir, rhoShScrLayerNir, rhoShScrLayerNir, rhoShScrPerLayerNir, rhoShScrPerLayerNir)
rhoShScrShScrPerNirDn.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the shading screen and semi-permanent shading screen combined layer towards the bottom

tauThScrLayerNir.description: NIR transmission coefficient of the thermal screen "layer": the vertical area of the thermal screen (whether the screen is deployed or not)
tauThScrLayerNir.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 208 (as above); pg. 208-209: "the last 2 cover layers [...] are calculated analogously to Eqs. (8.16) and (8.17)"

rhoThScrLayerNir.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the thermal screen "layer": the vertical area of the thermal screen (whether the screen is deployed or not)
rhoThScrLayerNir.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 208 (as above); pg. 208-209: "the last 2 cover layers [...] are calculated analogously to Eqs. (8.16) and (8.17)"

tauRfThScrNir.definition: tau12(tauRfNir, tauThScrLayerNir, rhoRfNir, rhoRfNir, rhoThScrLayerNir, rhoThScrLayerNir)
tauRfThScrNir.description: NIR transmission coefficient of the thermal screen and roof combined layer
tauRfThScrNir.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.14, 8.16; pg. 208-209: "the last 2 cover layers [...] are calculated analogously to Eqs. (8.16) and (8.17)"

rhoRfThScrNirUp.definition: rhoUp(tauRfNir, tauThScrLayerNir, rhoRfNir, rhoRfNir, rhoThScrLayerNir, rhoThScrLayerNir)
rhoRfThScrNirUp.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the thermal screen and roof combined layer towards the top
rhoRfThScrNirUp.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.15, 8.17; Katzin 2020, Equation A5; Vanthoor 2011, pg. 208-209: "the last 2 cover layers [...] are calculated analogously to Eqs. (8.16) and (8.17)"

rhoRfThScrNirDn.definition: rhoDn(tauRfNir, tauThScrLayerNir, rhoRfNir, rhoRfNir, rhoThScrLayerNir, rhoThScrLayerNir)
rhoRfThScrNirDn.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the thermal screen and roof combined layer towards the bottom
rhoRfThScrNirDn.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.15, 8.17; Katzin 2020, Equation A6; Vanthoor 2011, pg. 208-209: "the last 2 cover layers [...] are calculated analogously to Eqs. (8.16) and (8.17)"

tauCovNirVanthoor.definition: tau12(tauShScrShScrPerNir, tauRfThScrNir, rhoShScrShScrPerNirUp, rhoShScrShScrPerNirDn, rhoRfThScrNirUp, rhoRfThScrNirDn)
tauCovNirVanthoor.description: NIR transmission coefficient of the cover
tauCovNirVanthoor.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 209: "the transmission coefficient [...] determined using Eqs. (8.14) [...] of the two combined layers".  Extra variable added for easier model extension

rhoCovNirVanthoorUp.definition: rhoUp(tauShScrShScrPerNir, tauRfThScrNir, rhoShScrShScrPerNirUp, rhoShScrShScrPerNirDn, rhoRfThScrNirUp, rhoRfThScrNirDn)
rhoCovNirVanthoorUp.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the cover towards the top
rhoCovNirVanthoorUp.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 209: "the reflection coefficient [...] determined using Eqs. [...] (8.15) [...] of the two combined layers".  Extra variable added for easier model extension

rhoCovNirVanthoorDn.definition: rhoDn(tauShScrShScrPerNir, tauRfThScrNir, rhoShScrShScrPerNirUp, rhoShScrShScrPerNirDn, rhoRfThScrNirUp, rhoRfThScrNirDn)
rhoCovNirVanthoorDn.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the cover towards the top
rhoCovNirVanthoorDn.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 209: "the reflection coefficient [...] determined using Eqs. [...] (8.15) [...] of the two combined layers".  Extra variable added for easier model extension

rhoCovNir.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the cover towards the top
rhoCovNir.reference: Extra variable added for easier model extension

tauCovNir.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the cover towards the top
tauCovNir.reference: Extra variable added for easier model extension

aCovNir.description: NIR absorption coefficient of the cover
aCovNir.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 209: "the absorption coefficient is one minus the sum of the transmission and reflection coefficient". Note that Vanthoor 2011 uses the notation aGhPar while here we use aCovPar

FIR.about: This section is analogous to the section "PAR", above, following Vanthoor 2011, pg. 209: "The optical properties öf FIR for the lumped cover layer [...] are calculated analogously to the optical properties of PAR".

tauShScrLayerFir.description: FIR transmission coefficient of the shading screen "layer": the vertical area of the shading screen (whether the screen is deployed or not)

tauShScrPerLayerFir.description: FIR transmission coefficient of the semi-permanent shading screen "layer": the vertical area of the semi-permanent shading screen (whether it is deployed or not)

rhoShScrLayerFir.description: FIR reflection coefficient of the shading screen "layer": the vertical area of the shading screen (whether the screen is deployed or not)

rhoShScrPerLayerFir.description: FIR reflection coefficient of the semi-permanent shading screen "layer": the vertical area of the semi-permanent shading screen (whether it is deployed or not)

tauShScrShScrPerFir.definition: tau12(tauShScrLayerFir, tauShScrPerLayerFir, rhoShScrLayerFir, rhoShScrLayerFir, rhoShScrPerLayerFir, rhoShScrPerLayerFir)
tauShScrShScrPerFir.description: FIR transmission coefficient of the shading screen and semi-permanent shading screen combined layer

rhoShScrShScrPerFirUp.definition: rhoUp(tauShScrLayerFir, tauShScrPerLayerFir, rhoShScrLayerFir, rhoShScrLayerFir, rhoShScrPerLayerFir, rhoShScrPerLayerFir)
rhoShScrShScrPerFirUp.description: FIR reflection coefficient of the shading screen and semi-permanent shading screen combined layer towards the top

rhoShScrShScrPerFirDn.definition: rhoDn(tauShScrLayerFir, tauShScrPerLayerFir, rhoShScrLayerFir, rhoShScrLayerFir, rhoShScrPerLayerFir, rhoShScrPerLayerFir)
rhoShScrShScrPerFirDn.description: FIR reflection coefficient of the shading screen and semi-permanent shading screen combined layer towards the bottom

tauCovFir.definition: tau12(tauShScrShScrPerFir, tauRfFir, rhoShScrShScrPerFirUp, rhoShScrShScrPerFirDn, rhoRfFir, rhoRfFir)
tauCovFir.description: FIR transmission coefficient of the cover
tauCovFir.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 209: "the transmission coefficient [...] determined using Eqs. (8.14) [...] of the two combined layers"

rhoCovFir.definition: rhoUp(tauShScrShScrPerFir, tauRfFir, rhoShScrShScrPerFirUp, rhoShScrShScrPerFirDn, rhoRfFir, rhoRfFir)
rhoCovFir.description: FIR reflection coefficient of the cover
rhoCovFir.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 209: "the reflection coefficient [...] determined using Eqs. [...] (8.15) [...] of the two combined layers"

epsCovFir.description: FIR emission coefficient of the cover
epsCovFir.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 209: "the absorption coefficient is one minus the sum of the transmission and reflection coefficient [...] The FIR emission coefficient [...] equals the FIR absorption coefficient".

capCov.definition: cos(psi*pi/180) * (uShScrPer * hShScrPer * rhoShScrPer * cPShScrPer + hRf * rhoRf * cPRf)
capCov.description: Heat capacity of the lumped cover

hecCovInCovE.description: Heat exchange coefficient through the lumped cover

Capacities.about: Capacities for heat, vapour pressure, and CO2

capPipe.definition: 0.25 * pi * lPipe * ((phiPipeE**2 - phiPipeI**2) * rhoSteel * cPSteel + phiPipeI**2 * rhoWater * cPWater)

capAir.description: heat capacity of air in main compartment

capTop.description: heat capacity of air in top compartment - above the screen

rhoAirCap.description: Density of the air used for calculating capacities

capVpAir.description: Vapour pressure capacity of main compartment - below the screen

capVpTop.description: Vapour pressure capacity of top compartment - above the screen

capCo2Air.description: CO2 capacity of main compartment - below the screen

capCo2Top.description: CO2 capacity of top compartment - above the screen

rParSunCan.description: Total PAR from the sun absorbed by the canopy

rParSunCanDn.description: PAR from the sun directly absorbed by the canopy

rParGhSun.description: PAR above the canopy from the sun

rParCan.description: Total PAR above the canopy. Added here to allow easier modification of the model.

rParSunFlrCanUp.definition: rParGhSun * exp(-k1Par * lai) * rhoFlrPar * (1 - rhoCanPar) * (1 - exp(-k2Par * lai))
rParSunFlrCanUp.description: PAR from the sun absorbed by the canopy after reflection from the floor

tauHatCovNir.description: Virtual NIR transmission for the cover-canopy-floor lumped model

tauHatFlrNir.description: Virtual NIR transmission for the cover-canopy-floor lumped model

tauHatCanNir.description: NIR transmission coefficient of the canopy

rhoHatCanNir.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the canopy

tauCovCanNir.definition: tau12(tauHatCovNir, tauHatCanNir, rhoCovNir, rhoCovNir, rhoHatCanNir, rhoHatCanNir)
tauCovCanNir.description: NIR transmission coefficient of the cover and canopy
tauCovCanNir.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 213: "The NIR transmission, reflection [...] are determined [...] in a similar way as Eqs. 8.14-8.17"

rhoCovCanNirUp.definition: rhoUp(tauHatCovNir, tauHatCanNir, rhoCovNir, rhoCovNir, rhoHatCanNir, rhoHatCanNir)
rhoCovCanNirUp.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the cover and canopy towards the top
rhoCovCanNirUp.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 213: "The NIR transmission, reflection [...] are determined [...] in a similar way as Eqs. 8.14-8.17"

rhoCovCanNirDn.definition: rhoDn(tauHatCovNir, tauHatCanNir, rhoCovNir, rhoCovNir, rhoHatCanNir, rhoHatCanNir)
rhoCovCanNirDn.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the cover and canopy towards the bottom
rhoCovCanNirDn.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 213: "The NIR transmission, reflection [...] are determined [...] in a similar way as Eqs. 8.14-8.17"

tauCovCanFlrNir.definition: tau12(tauCovCanNir, tauHatFlrNir, rhoCovCanNirUp, rhoCovCanNirDn, rhoFlrNir, rhoFlrNir)
tauCovCanFlrNir.description: NIR transmission coefficient of the cover, canopy and floor lumped layer
tauCovCanFlrNir.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 213: "The NIR transmission, reflection [...] are determined [...] in a similar way as Eqs. 8.14-8.17"

rhoCovCanFlrNir.definition: rhoUp(tauCovCanNir, tauHatFlrNir, rhoCovCanNirUp, rhoCovCanNirDn, rhoFlrNir, rhoFlrNir)
rhoCovCanFlrNir.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the cover, canopy and floor
rhoCovCanFlrNir.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 213: "The NIR transmission, reflection [...] are determined [...] in a similar way as Eqs. 8.14-8.17"

aCanNir.description: The NIR absorption coefficient of the canopy
aCanNir.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 213: "the calculated absorption coefficient of the multiple-layers (which is 1-tauCovCanFlrNir-rhoChoCanFlrNir) equals the overall NIR absorption coefficient of the canopy aCanNir"

aFlrNir.description: The overall NIR absorption coefficient of the floor
aFlrNir.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 213: "the calculated transmission coefficient of the multiple-layers (which is tauCovCanFlrNir) equals the overall NIR absorption coefficient of the floor, aFlrNir

rNirSunCan.description: NIR from the sun absorbed by the canopy

rNirSunFlr.description: NIR from the sun absorbed by the floor

rParSunFlr.description: PAR from the sun absorbed by the floor

rGlobSunAir.description: Global radiation from the sun absorbed by the greenhouse air

rGlobSunCovE.description: Global radiation from the sun absorbed by the cover
rGlobSunCovE.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.37. Note that aCovPar, aCovNir is used here instead of aGhPar, aGhNir there

parCan.description: Total PAR absorbed by the canopy, expressed in µmol m**-2 s**-1. This value is passed to the crop model to calculate photosynthesis. Added here to allow easier modification of the model.

fir(a1, eps1, eps2, f12, t1, t2).description: Net far infrared flux from 1 to 2

tauThScrFirU.description: FIR transmission coefficient of the thermal screen
tauThScrFirU.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.39. Note that Fir here is used instead of TIR

aCan.description: Surface of canopy per floor area for calculation of FIR exchanges

fCanFlr.description: View factor from canopy to floor

aPipe.description: Surface of pipes for floor area

rCanCovIn.definition: fir(aCan, epsCan, epsCovFir, tauThScrFirU, tCan, tCovIn)

rCanSky.definition: fir(aCan, epsCan, epsSky, tauCovFir*tauThScrFirU, tCan, tSky)

rCanThScr.definition: fir(aCan, epsCan, epsThScrFir, uThScr, tCan, tThScr)
rCanThScr.description: FIR between canopy and thermal screen

rCanFlr.definition: fir(aCan, epsCan, epsFlr, fCanFlr, tCan, tFlr)

rPipeCovIn.definition: fir(aPipe, epsPipe, epsCovFir, tauThScrFirU*0.49*exp(-kFir*lai), tPipe, tCovIn)

rPipeThScr.definition: fir(aPipe, epsPipe, epsThScrFir, uThScr*0.49*exp(-kFir*lai), tPipe, tThScr)
rPipeThScr.description: FIR between pipes and thermal screen

rFlrThScr.description: FIR between floor and thermal screen

rThScrCovIn.definition: fir(1, epsThScrFir, epsCovFir, uThScr, tThScr, tCovIn)
rThScrCovIn.description: FIR between thermal screen and cover

rThScrSky.definition: fir(1, epsThScrFir, epsSky, tauCovFir*uThScr, tThScr, tSky)
rThScrSky.description: FIR between thermal screen and sky

sensible(hec, t1, t2).description: Convection or conduction from object 1 to object 2
sensible(hec, t1, t2).reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.40. Note that abs of hec is taken to ensure that heat flow is always from 1 to 2

hCanAir.description: Convection between canopy and air in main compartment

hAirFlr.definition: sensible(ifElse(tFlr>tAir, 1.7*abs((tFlr - tAir))**0.33, 1.3 * abs((tAir - tFlr))**0.25), tAir, tFlr)
hAirFlr.description: Convection between air in main compartment and floor

hAirThScr.description: Convection between air in main compartment and thermal screen

hAirOut.description: Convection between air in main compartment and outside air

hAirTop.description: Convection between air in main and top compartment

hThScrTop.definition: sensible(1.7 * uThScr * abs(tThScr - tTop)**0.33, tThScr, tTop)
hThScrTop.description: Convection between thermal screen and air in top compartment

hTopCovIn.definition: sensible(cHecIn * abs(tTop - tCovIn)**0.33 * aCov / aFlr, tTop, tCovIn)
hTopCovIn.description: Convection between air in top compartment and cover

hTopOut.description: Convection between air in top compartment and outside air

hCovEOut.definition: sensible(aCov / aFlr * (cHecOut1 + cHecOut2 * wind**cHecOut3), tCovE, tOut)
hCovEOut.description: Convection between cover and outside air

hPipeAir.definition: sensible(1.99 * pi * phiPipeE * lPipe * (abs(tPipe - tAir))**0.32, tPipe, tAir)
hPipeAir.description: Convection between pipes and air in main compartment

hFlrSo1.definition: sensible(2 / (hFlr / lambdaFlr + hSo1 / lambdaSo), tFlr, tSo1)
hFlrSo1.description: Conduction between floor and soil layer 1

hSo5SoOut.description: Conduction between soil layer 5 and the external soil layer

fThScr.definition: uThScr * kThScr * (abs((tAir - tTop))**0.66) + ((1 - uThScr) / rhoAirMean) * sqrt(0.5 * rhoAirMean * (1 - uThScr) * g * abs(rhoAir - rhoTop))
fThScr.reference:
Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.41; De Zwart 1996, Equation 5.68

Note that there is a mistake in Vanthoor: according to De Zwart (1996), Equation 5.68, pg. 91, tOut, rhoOut, should be tTop, rhoTop. There is also a mistake in De Zwart: whenever sqrt is taken, abs should be included

Also note, that rhoAir is used here (see below), and not rhoAirCap which is used in calculating capacities (Eq. 8.24 in Vanthoor 2011). Note that fScr is used here instead of fThScr in Vanthoor.

fScr.description: Air flux through the screens layer (may include multiple screens)
fScr.reference: Added here for easier model extension

rhoAir.description: Density of the air in the main compartment (below the screen)
rhoAir.reference: Calculated for dry air using the ideal gas law. See, e.g., https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Density_of_air

rhoTop.description: Density of the air in the top compartment (above the screen)
rhoTop.reference: Calculated for dry air using the ideal gas law. See, e.g., https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Density_of_air

pressure.description: Absolute air pressure at given elevation

rhoAirMean.description: Mean density of the air below and above the screen.
rhoAirMean.reference:
Vanthoor 2011, pg. 215; De Zwart 1996, Equation 5.68

Note that there is a mistake in Vanthoor: according to De Zwart (1996), Equation 5.68, pg. 91, tOut, rhoOut, should be tTop, rhoTop

hCovInCovE.description: Conductive heat flux through the lumped cover

lAirThScr.description: Latent heat flux by condensation on thermal screen

lTopCovIn.description: Latent heat flux by condensation on cover

cond(hec, vp1, vp2).description: Vapour flux from the air to an object by condensation
cond(hec, vp1, vp2).reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.44. Note that according to Vanthoor Table 8.1 (pg. 232), sMV12 is -0.1

mvAirThScr.description: Condensation from main compartment on thermal screen - Vapour fluxes

mvTopCovIn.definition: cond(cHecIn * abs(tTop - tCovIn)**0.33 * aCov / aFlr, vpTop, satVp(tCovIn))
mvTopCovIn.description: Condensation from top compartment to cover - Vapour fluxes

airMv(f12, vp1, vp2, t1, t2).description: Vapour flux accompanying an air flux
airMv(f12, vp1, vp2, t1, t2).reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.45. Note that according to Table 8.1 (pg. 232), mWater is 18 and R is 8314. Also note that abs(f12) is taken so that the vapour flux is always from high vapour to low vapour

mvAirTop.description: Vapour flux from main to top compartment (through the screen layer)

mvAirOut.description: Vapour flux from main compartment to outside

mvTopOut.description: Vapour flux from top compartment to outside

satVp(temp).description: Saturated vapour pressure (Pa) at temperature temp (°C)

airMc(f12, c1, c2).description: CO2 flux accompanying an air flux

mcAirTop.description: CO2 flux from main to top compartment (through the screen layer)

mcAirOut.description: Vapour flux from main compartment to outside

mcTopOut.description: Vapour flux from top compartment to outside

vecCanAir.description: Vapour transfer coefficient of canopy transpiration
vecCanAir.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.48. Note L is used here instead of DeltaH there

rCanSun.description: Global radiation (PAR+NIR) above the canopy from the sun

rCan.reference: Following Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.28. Added for easier model extension

rfCo2.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.50, and note below "Stanghellini limited the resistance factor for high CO2 levels to 1.5"

rfVp.description: Vapour pressure influence on stomatal resistance
rfVp.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.50, and note below "Stanghellini limited [...] the resistance factor for large vapour pressure differences to 5.8"

sRs.description: Smooth switch between day and night, needed to account for difference in day/night transpiration paramemters

cEvap3.description: Parameter for CO2 influence on stomatal resistance
cEvap3.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.52. Note that the unit there is incorrect. Also note that cEvap3Night there erroneously appears twice.

cEvap4.description: Parameter for vapour pressure influence on stomatal resistance - Canopy Transpiration
cEvap4.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.52. Note that the unit there is incorrect. Also note that cEvap3Night there erroneously appears twice.

hBlowAir.description: Heat flux from direct air heater

mcBlowAir.description: CO2 flux from direct air heater

mvBlowAir.description: Vapour flux from direct air heater

hBoilPipe.description: Heat flux from the boiler to the heating pipe

hIndPipe.description: Heat flux from an industrial source to the heating pipe
hIndPipe.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.56. Note uHeatInd is used here instead of uInd there

hGeoPipe.description: Heat flux from a geothermal source to the heating pipe
hGeoPipe.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.56. Note uHeatGeo is used here instead of uGeo there

hPasAir.description: Heat flux from the buffer to the heating pipe

mvPadAir.description: Vapour flux from the pad and fan to the greenhouse air

fPad.description: Ventilation flux due to the pad and fan system

hPadAir.definition: fPad * (rhoAir * cPAir * tOut - L * rhoAir * (etaPad * (xPad - xOut)))
hPadAir.description: Sensible heat flux from the pad to the greenhouse air

xOut.description: Water vapour content of the outdoor air

hAirOutPad.description: Sensible heat flux from the greenhouse air to the outside air

mvAirOutPad.description: Vapour flux from the greenhouse air to the outside air due to the pad and fan
mvAirOutPad.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.62. Note that this may be a mistake - compare to Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.45

mcPadAir.description: Net CO2 flux from the outside air to the greenhouse due to the pad and fan

hecMechAir.definition: (uMechCool * copMechCool * pMechCool / aFlr) / (tAir - tMechCool + 6.4e-9 * L * (vpAir - satVp(tMechCool)))
hecMechAir.description: Heat exchange coefficinet between the surface of the mechanical cooling unit and the greenhouse air

hMechAir.description: Heat flux from the mechanical cooling to the greenhouse air

mvAirMech.description: Vapour flux from the greenhouse air to the surface of the mechanical cooling system

mvFogAir.description: Vapour flux from the fogging system to the greenhouse air

lAirFog.description: Heat flux of the air needed to evaporate the fog

fVentRoof2.definition: uRoof * aRoof * cD / (2 * aFlr) * sqrt(abs(g * hVent * (tAir - tOut) / (2 * (0.5 * tAir + 0.5 * tOut + 273.15)) + cW * wind**2))
fVentRoof2.description: Natural ventilation rate due to roof ventilation

fVentRoofSide2.definition: cD / aFlr * sqrt((aRoofU * aSideU / sqrt(max(aRoofU**2 + aSideU**2, 0.01)))**2 * (2 * g * hSideRoof * (tAir - tOut) / (0.5 * tAir + 0.5 * tOut + 273.15)) + ((aRoofU + aSideU) / 2)**2 * cW * wind**2)
fVentRoofSide2.description: Ventilation rate through roof and side vents
fVentRoofSide2.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.66. A small modification has been added to avoid division by zero

etaInsScr.description: Ventilation reduction factor due to the insect screen
etaInsScr.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Equation 8.70. Note that the unit there seems to be wrong

fVentRoof.definition: ifElse(etaRoof >= etaRoofThr, etaInsScr * fVentRoof2 + 0.5 * fLeakage, etaInsScr * (uThScr * fVentRoof2 + (1 - uThScr) * fVentRoofSide2 * etaRoof) + 0.5 * fLeakage)

fVentSide.definition: ifElse(etaRoof >= etaRoofThr, etaInsScr * fVentSide2 + 0.5 * fLeakage, etaInsScr * (uThScr * fVentSide2 + (1 - uThScr) * fVentRoofSide2 * etaSide) + 0.5 * fLeakage)

etaRoof.description: Ratio between roof vent area and total ventilation area

etaSide.description: Ratio between side vent area and total ventilation area

fVentForced2.description: Forced ventilation, not including the insect screen

fVentForced.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 225: "The effect of the insect screens on the forced ventilation is determined using Eq. 8.70"

mcExtAir.description: CO2 added to the greenhouse by an external CO2 source

alfaLeafAir.description: Convective heat exchange coefficient from the canopy leaf to the greenhouse air

epsCan.description: FIR emission coefficient of the canopy

epsSky.description: FIR emission coefficient of the sky

etaGlobNir.description: Ratio between NIR and the outside global radiation

etaGlobPar.description: Ratio between PAR and the outside global radiation

etaHeatCo2.description: Amount of CO2 which is released when 1 Joule of sensible energy is produced by the heat blower

etaHeatVap.description: Amount of vapour which is released when 1 Joule of sensible energy is produced by the heat blower

etaMgPpm.description: CO2 conversion factor from mg m**-3 to ppm

etaRoofThr.description: Ratio between roof vent area and total ventilation area where no chimney effect is assumed

rhoAir0.description: Density of air at sea level

rhoCanPar.description: PAR reflection coefficient of the canopy

rhoCanNir.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the top of the canopy

omega.description: Yearly frequency to calculate soil temperature

capLeaf.description: Heat capacity of a square meter of canopy leaves

cEvap1.description: Coefficient for radiation effect on stomatal resistance

cEvap2.description: Coefficient for radiation effect on stomatal resistance

cEvap3Day.description: Coefficient for co2 effect on stomatal resistance (day)

cEvap3Night.description: Coefficient for co2 effect on stomatal resistance (night)

cEvap4Day.description: Coefficient for vapour pressure effect on stomatal resistance (day)

cEvap4Night.description: Coefficient for vapour pressure effect on stomatal resistance (night)

hSoOut.description: Thickness of the external soil layer

k1Par.description: PAR extinction coefficient of the canopy

k2Par.description: PAR extinction coefficient of the canopy for PAR reflected from the floor

kNir.description: NIR extinction coefficient of the canopy

kFir.description: FIR extinction coefficient of the canopy

rCanSp.description: Radiation value above the canopy when night becomes day

rB.description: Boundary layer resistance of the canopy for vapour transport

sRsSlope.description: slope of smoothed stomatal resistance model

etaGlobAir.description: Ratio of global radiation absorbed by the greenhouse construction

aCov.description: Surface of the cover including side walls

cHecIn.description: Convective heat exchange between cover and outdoor air

cHecOut1.description: Convective heat exchange parameter between cover and outdoor air

cHecOut2.description: Convective heat exchange parameter between cover and outdoor air

cHecOut3.description: Convective heat exchange parameter between cover and outdoor air

hAir.description: Height of the main compartment (below the screen)

etaShScrCd.description: Effect of shading screen on discharge coefficient

etaShScrCw.description: Effect of shading screen on wind pressure coefficient

hSideRoof.description: Vertical distance between mid-points of side wall and roof ventilation openings

hVent.description: Vertical dimension of a single ventilation opening

epsRfFir.description: FIR emission coefficient of the roof

rhoRfNir.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the roof

rhoRfPar.description: PAR reflection coefficient of the roof

rhoRfFir.description: FIR reflection coefficient of the roof

tauRfNir.description: NIR transmission coefficient of the roof

tauRfPar.description: PAR transmission coefficient of the roof

tauRfFir.description: FIR transmission coefficient of the roof

lambdaRf.description: Thermal heat conductivity of the roof

cPRf.description: Specific heat capacity of roof layer

epsShScrPerFir.description: FIR emission coefficient of the whitewash

lambdaShScrPer.description: Thermal heat conductivity of the whitewash
lambdaShScrPer.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Table 8.2 (Netherlands - no whitewash - value is Inf (or very high))

cPShScrPer.description: Specific heat capacity of the whitewash

rhoShScrNir.description: NIR reflection coefficient of shading screen

rhoShScrPar.description: PAR reflection coefficient of shading screen

rhoShScrFir.description: FIR reflection coefficient of shading screen

tauShScrNir.description: NIR transmission coefficient of shading screen

tauShScrPar.description: PAR transmission coefficient of shading screen

tauShScrFir.description: FIR transmission coefficient of shading screen

epsThScrFir.description: FIR emissions coefficient of the thermal screen

rhoThScrNir.description: NIR reflection coefficient of thermal screen

rhoThScrPar.description: PAR reflection coefficient of thermal screen

rhoThScrFir.description: FIR reflection coefficient of thermal screen

tauThScrNir.description: NIR transmission coefficient of thermal screen

tauThScrPar.description: PAR transmission coefficient of thermal screen

tauThScrFir.description: FIR transmission coefficient of thermal screen

cPThScr.description: Specific heat capacity of thermal screen

epsFlr.description: FIR emission coefficient of the floor

rhoFlrNir.description: NIR reflection coefficient of the floor

rhoFlrPar.description: PAR reflection coefficient of the floor

lambdaFlr.description: Thermal heat conductivity of the floor

cPFlr.description: Specific heat capacity of the floor

rhoCpSo.description: Volumetric heat capacity of the soil

lambdaSo.description: Thermal heat conductivity of the soil layers

epsPipe.description: FIR emission coefficient of the heating pipes

lPipe.description: Length of heating pipes per greenhouse floor area

etaPad.description: Efficiency of the pad and fan system
etaPad.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Table 8.2 (Netherlands) - no pad and fan

phiPad.description: Capacity of the air flux through the pad and fan
phiPad.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Table 8.2 (Netherlands) - no pad and fan

phiVentForced.description: Air flow capacity of the forced ventilation system

copMechCool.description: Coefficient of performance of the mechanical cooling system

hecPasAir.description: Convective heat exchange coefficient between passive heat storage and greenhouse air

pGeo.description: Heat capacity of geothermal heat source

pInd.description: Heat capacity of industrial heat source

pMechCool.description: Electrical capacity of mechanical cooling system

tMechCool.description: Temperature of the cool surface of the mechanical cooling system

xPad.description: Water vapour content of the pad
xPad.reference: Vanthoor 2011, Table 8.2 (Netherlands) - no pad and fan

parJtoUmolSun.description: Conversion factor of sun's PAR from J to µmol{photons}
parJtoUmolSun.reference: Based on the parameter etaGlobPar of Vanthoor (conversion of global radiation (J) to PAR (µmol), Table 9.1), and etaGlobPar of Vanthoor (Fraction of PAR in global radiation, Table 8.1). Included here for easier modification of the model.

pi.reference: Included here to ensure this constant is parsed correctly regardless of solver chosen.

Crop.reference: Vanthoor 2011, pg. 217: "mcAirCan depends on canopy photosynthesis [...] which were described in chapter 3". In this file, we assume no crop.

co2InPpm.description: CO2 concentration in main compartment - Converted to ppm
co2InPpm.reference: Conversion used in Katzin 2020, see line 884 in https://github.com/davkat1/GreenLight/blob/4ec6018e0aad2775ad11085d34f3886a7b7dd052/Code/createGreenLightModel/setGlAux.m

co2dens2ppm(temp, dens).description: Convert CO2 density (kg m^{-3}) to molar concentration (ppm); pressure is assumed to be 1 atm
co2dens2ppm(temp, dens).reference: Calculation based on ideal gas law pV=nRT, used in Katzin 2020, see https://github.com/davkat1/GreenLight/blob/4ec6018e0aad2775ad11085d34f3886a7b7dd052/Code/serviceFunctions/co2dens2ppm.m

Greenhouse climate control.about: In this file, we assume no greenhouse climate control, therefore all controls are set to 0

uBlow.description: Control of the direct heat air blower

uBoil.description: Control valve of the heat boiler

uHeatInd.description: Control of the heat input from an industrial source

uHeatGeo.description: Control of the heat input from geothermal source

uPad.description: Control of the pad and fan

uExtCo2.description: Control of the external CO2 source

uShScr.description: Closure of external shading screen, 0 is open (folded screen), 1 is closed (spread out screen)

uShScrPer.description: Closure of semi-permanent shading screen (whitewash), 0 is open (no whitewash), 1 is closed (whitewash applied)

uThScr.description: Closure of thermal screen, 0 is open (folded screen), 1 is closed (spread out screen)

min(a,b).description: Minimum of two variables, defined here so it will work regardless of solver used

max(a,b).description: Maximum of two variables, defined here so it will work regardless of solver used

Inputs.about: Input variables required for the model. Here they are given as constants. In order to run meaningful simulations, a file with tim eseries input data should be provided

iGlob.description: Outside global radiation from the sun

tSoOut.description: Soil temperature of outer soil layer

vpOut.description: Outdoor air vapour pressure at 20°C and about 70% relative humidity
